packages.name: NURD Symbol Library
packages.description: Standardized KiCad library with sourcing attributes (MPN, MF, S1 fields).
packages.description_full: The NURD Symbol Library standardizes supplier and manufacturer metadata in KiCad symbols. Fields include MPN, MF, S1 Part number, S1 Part link, S1 Description, and S1 Price @ 100 for reliable BOMs and procurement.
